<!--- # Research Areas -->

Our group conducts pharmacological research across four main areas:


::: {.grid}

::: {.g-col-4}
[**Infectious Diseases**](research/infectiousdiseases.qmd)

Pharmacy practice of pharmacokinetics / pharmacodynamics (PK/PD) to susceptible or resistant organisms

:::

::: {.g-col-4}
[**Antimicrobial Stewardship**](research/antimicrobialstewardship.qmd)

Pharmacy practice of antimicrobial stewardship and economic justification

:::

::: {.g-col-4}
[**Antimicrobial Resistance**](research/antimicrobialresistance.qmd)

Spatiotemporal genomic epidemiology and pharmacology

:::

::: {.g-col-4}
[**Human Gut Microbiome** ](research/humangutmicrobiome.qmd)

Dynamics and Host-Microbe Interactions

:::

::: {.g-col-4}

**Drug Development**

Antibiotics, probiotics, antifungals, and antivirals

:::

::: {.g-col-4}

###**Economic Analysis**
